item.description: Come spend a day enjoying the quaintness of a New England seaport town. We'll start by heading towards Ogunquit, ME and stop at the many antique and gift shops along the way. Once we reach the center of town, we'll park and enjoy lunch and more window shopping. We'll head back through York, ME and spend a few hours hitting the outlet stores in Kittery, ME.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the front of the building with a Toyota Corolla

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Day trip to Maine
